00010 TranslateControlServer::TranslateControlServer(std::string action_name, std::string ctrl_translate_topic):
00011 as(n, action_name, boost::bind(&TranslateControlServer::executeCB, this, _1), false),
00012 action_name(action_name) {
00013         ROS_INFO("Starting Up Traverse Command Server on <%s>", this->action_name.c_str());
00014         //Start up the command server
00015         as.start();
00016         //Advertise to intra-process publisher
00017         this->trans_pub = this->n.advertise<oryx_drive_controller::VelocityTranslate>(ctrl_translate_topic, 2);
00018 
00019 }

00024 void TranslateControlServer::executeCB(const oryx_drive_controller::TranslateCommandGoalConstPtr& goal){
00025         ROS_INFO("Got Goal <X_v=%f, Y-v=%f> on <%s>", goal->x_velocity,goal->y_velocity, this->action_name.c_str());
00026 
00027         bool success;
00028         // check that preempt has not been requested by the client
00029         if (as.isPreemptRequested() || !ros::ok())
00030         {
00031                 ROS_INFO("%s: Preempted", action_name.c_str());
00032                 // set the action state to preempted
00033                 as.setPreempted();
00034                 success = false;
00035         }
00036 
00037         else{
00038                         //Create a new message to send to the controller
00039                         oryx_drive_controller::VelocityTranslatePtr msg(new oryx_drive_controller::VelocityTranslate);
00040 
00041                         //Build the message
00042                         msg->x_velocity = goal->x_velocity;
00043                         msg->y_velocity = goal->y_velocity;
00044 
00045                         //Publish the message
00046                         this->trans_pub.publish(msg);
00047 
00048                         this->result.capable = true;
00049                         this->result.success = true;
00050                         success = true;
00051                 }
00052                 //set success
00053                 if(success){
00054                         this->as.setSucceeded(this->result, "I successfully set the new Velocity Translate goal");
00055         }
00056 }
